common_json.DeleteAccountWindow.text1: You are requesting to delete your account.%{newline}If you tap "Continue", all your account data will be deleted, including your:%{newline}1. Purchases.%{newline}2. Game progress.%{newline}3. Account info.
common_json.DeleteAccountWindow.text2: The deletion process takes %{days} days. After that, you won't be able to restore any of your account data.
common_json.DeleteAccountWindow.text3: If you return to the game before %{days} days expire, you'll be able to revert the process, restore your progress, and keep enjoying the game.
common_json.DeleteAccountConfirmationWindow.title: Delete account confirmation
common_json.DeleteAccountConfirmationWindow.text1: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
common_json.DeleteAccountConfirmationWindow.text2: If you tap "Delete", the app will close. The deletion process takes %{days} days. After that, you won't be able to restore any of your account data.
common_json.DeleteAccountConfirmationWindow.text3: If you return after %{days} days expire:%{newline}1. You won't be able to cancel the account deletion.%{newline}2. You'll lose all of your account data, including game progress and purchases.%{newline}3. You'll have to start the game from the beginning.
common_json.DeleteAccountInformationWindow.title: Your account is being deleted
common_json.DeleteAccountInformationWindow.time: Your account will be deleted within %{days} days.
common_json.DeleteAccountInformationWindow.text1: The account you used to log in is undergoing the deletion process. Cancel the deletion to save all of your account data.%{newline}To do that, simply press on the "Cancel" button to restore your progress and purchases.
common_json.DeleteAccountInformationWindow.text2: If you decide to proceed with deletion, kindly make sure that you don't have any active subscriptions related to the account. Billing for an auto-renewable subscription continues through your provider regardless of whether you delete your game account.

project_json.Units.dwarf.describe: Granddaughter of the great explorer and scientist, Lisa always found it fun to dig in the dirt when she was little. Despite her growing into an independent urban woman sheâ€™s still having her adventurous spark inside ready to be ignited again.
project_json.Units.king.describe: His European upbringing left Axel no other choice than always speak up his mind. To balance his zingy wits the nature blissed him with a set of skills to help others bear his straightforwardness. If you ever decide to go on a hike in the neighborhood, Axel would be your best choice of guide.
project_json.Units.bear.describe: Still being mischievous and rebellious like all teenagers, Marina finds the will in her kind heart to be a helpful granddaughter despite her pubescent mood swings. Her daily visit to the beach is a must-have since sheâ€™s dedicated to her goal of becoming the world surfboard champion.
project_json.Units.elf.describe: If there is anyone on the island who can name you 100 differences between the Rhizanthella gardneri and the Phalaenopsis Orchids, it is Gloria. Previously, she worked as a curator of a botanical garden on the mainland, but having gone on an expedition to the island, she never returned home. Because she found a new one there.
project_json.Units.warlock.describe: Like all the rest, Santa Cruz came to the island looking for a better life but has quickly found that there is no way to escape hard work. Even in the tropical paradise. This notion helped him build small but capable fleet and build a profitable enterprise. Despite his success you wonâ€™t find a more modest human being.
project_json.Units.troll.describe: Nobody loves nature more than Elena. She was born to discover and when she yielded to her brotherâ€™s persuasion and visited him on the island there was no way she wouldnâ€™t fall in love with it. Whether Axel knew it was inevitable or not, thatâ€™s history. Elena enjoys her tropical life and daily fulfills her calling.
project_json.Units.knight.describe: Raised on Conan Doyle's and Christieâ€™s books, this uncompromising private investigator is sharp as a tack. Relentless, he will never stop until he reaches his goal, whatever it might be. One thing you can be certain of, he will never take a case he doesn't find interesting, even if the payment is as handsome as his finely groomed mustache.
project_json.Units.hunter.describe: Sent all the way from Paris, this postman knows his stamps. There is no place on Earth where he has not set his foot, and Marcel always delivers. Your correspondence is in safe hands with this selfless postal service veteran.
project_json.Units.centaur.describe: Can you imagine what could happen if you combine the abundance of tropical ingredients with the skill of the most artful and masterful chef? A tapestry of tastes and flavors grand enough to reach far and beyond. This is the only way Jenny works. Even despite her cheerful demeanor, she is a true professional when it comes to her kitchen.
project_json.Units.gnomes.describe: Can an island have a better guardian than someone who looks like an island himself? This humble giant has the biggest heart and will always find a way to help you. Whether you just met or know each other for ages. The island is in the safest hands possible!
project_json.Units.shark.describe: It's hard to be an only veterinarian on a tropical island full of unique species but Bethany was born to do that. Her endless passion and devotion to our four-legged friends and alike has no limits. If you're lucky enough to get her on the team then make no mistake all of the local animals will be forever grateful.

project_json.Tutorial.dwarf.step1: It feels good to be back even though everything looks different from when I was a little girl. Let's unpack first and investigate later.
project_json.Tutorial.wheat_3_tutorial.step1: I still remember grandpa teaching me to grow local fruit. First, we merge them once.
project_json.Tutorial.wheat_3_tutorial.step2: Then once more. He always told me to be patient when cultivating anything.
project_json.Tutorial.wheat_3_tutorial.step3: We're so close! Let's merge these last three pieces together.
project_json.Tutorial.dishes_0.step1: Press on the garden bed to harvest.
project_json.Tutorial.dishes_0.step2: So ripe! Let's pick up the fruit.
project_json.Tutorial.dishes_0.step3: Now I can trade our harvest for something as valuable.
project_json.Tutorial.dishes_0.step5: To be honest, I have no idea what this amulet is for... But I have to use it now that I have it!
project_json.Tutorial.dishes_0.step6: Wow! Apparently, it's somehow related to these lands. What if I try to apply it?
project_json.Tutorial.wood_1.step1: We still donâ€™t know where these weeds came from but we have to cut them to free up space and get resources.
project_json.Tutorial.wood_1.step2: Youâ€™re already familiar with local Commodity Exchange. They offer the best prices for freshly cut leaves.
project_json.Tutorial.wood_1.step3: Now we can merge our resources into a nice little haystack.
project_json.Tutorial.wood_2.step1: Letâ€™s clear this piece of land so we could utilize it later.
project_json.Tutorial.wood_2.step2: You donâ€™t have to wait your whole life for this to happen. Time is money. Letâ€™s speed things up!
project_json.Tutorial.wood_2.step3: And here is our reward for the job well done!
project_json.Tutorial.wood_2.step4: The best thing about it is that you never know what's inside. Aren't you excited to find out?
project_json.Tutorial.build_wood_2.step1: The stacks are getting higher, if you know what I mean. Let's form this heap by pressing on it.
project_json.Tutorial.build_wood_2.step2: And don't forget to speed up! We can find better ways to use our time.
project_json.Tutorial.woodgenerator_1.step1: The faster we explore this place, the faster we'll get to the next one.
project_json.Tutorial.woodgenerator_1.step2: Let's go inside and see what we can find there before moving on!
project_json.Tutorial.crystal.step1: Instead of trying to understand how and why ancient magic works we should just take advantage of it. Time to study the manual!
project_json.Tutorial.kraken_0.step1: Press on the vessel to start fishing.
project_json.Tutorial.story_fruitshop_0.step1: I like to collect my own harvest but sometimes itâ€™s just more convenient to go shopping. Letâ€™s see what theyâ€™ve got!
project_json.Tutorial.story_resourceshop_0.step1: I had a really nice experience when shopping for fruit and I expect the same level of pleasure when buying resources!
project_json.Tutorial.story_discountshop_0.step1: My grandpa used to take me to stores full of unique antiquities. It was his favorite thing to do and the apple hasnâ€™t fallen too far from the tree!

project_json.moneyFog1.name: Tropical Bay
project_json.moneyFog1.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of tropical land and dozens of useful items! Boost your progress and help your friends renovate the island!
project_json.moneyFog2.name: Whitlockâ€™s Trove
project_json.moneyFog2.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of tropical land and become a part of history! Archibald Whitlock himself used to bring all the treasures he could find to this island and you can be the one to own it.
project_json.moneyFog3.name: Palm Rocks
project_json.moneyFog3.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of tropical land and treat yourself to treasure harvest! Many riches this area has to offer are located here and are being protected by ancient spirits. Are you brave enough to claim them?
project_json.moneyFog4.name: Floating treasure
project_json.moneyFog4.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of tropical land and expand your territory! You have big plans for the island and the bigger it gets the closer you become to realising all of your dreams!
project_json.moneyFog5.name: Harbour of prosperity
project_json.moneyFog5.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of tropical land and let your imagination run free! With countless new resources and vast new territory the sky is a limit for your island renovation!
project_json.moneyFog6.name: Peafowlâ€™s tail
project_json.moneyFog6.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of tropical land and experience true beauty! There is nothing as lush and bright as peafowlâ€™s plumage but we believe that this place can match it!
project_json.moneyFog7.name: Aztec gem
project_json.moneyFog7.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of tropical land and become a part of history! Can you feel the presence of ancient spirits? Become a part of this indigenous feast by owning one of the most abundant islands!
project_json.moneyFog8.name: Gator's treasure
project_json.moneyFog8.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of tropical land and open new territories! Continue growing your island with a variety of rich resources!
project_json.moneyFog9.name: Feline depository
project_json.moneyFog9.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of tropical land and discover the secret treasure! Help your team construct the best enclosure in the world by taking advantage of the vast resources this special place has to offer!
project_json.moneyFog10.name: Spicky plains
project_json.moneyFog10.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of tropical land and help your team! It's time to learn Archibald's secret and there is no better way to do it than with a help of valuable extra resources!
project_json.moneyFog11.name: Ancient land
project_json.moneyFog11.text: Get %{tiles} extra pieces of tropical land and get a chance to solve the greatest mystery! The team is closer than ever to finding out the truth about Archibaldâ€™s disappearance. Get these invaluable resources to help them learn the truth!
project_json.LivesFeastGuideWindow.title: How does it work?
project_json.LivesFeastGuideWindow.description: Use energy to renovate the island and become one of its top inhabitants! The higher is your place on the podium, the more gifts you will receive.

project_json.SoftFeastGuideWindow.description: Spend coins to Compete with other adventurers around the world! The higher is your place on the podium, the more tropical gifts you will receive.
project_json.KrakenFeastGuideWindow.title: Magic bait
project_json.KrakenFeastGuideWindow.description: Use the amulets to become a fisherman and fill the vessel with your grand catch! Get a reward for each fish caught! Compete with players around the world to get ahead!

quests_json.Quest.dishes_0.step1: I don't need fruit since I ate on the plane. What I do need is a Commodity Exchange. My grandpa used to take me there all the time.
quests_json.Quest.wood_1.step1: Uncle Roger! What are you doing here with this hay? I thought you retired.
quests_json.Quest.wood_1.step2: Somebody had to take care of the island after your grandpa disappeared. Will you help me get more of it?
quests_json.Quest.wood_1.step3: Of course. Thank you for inviting me. Although I feel sad that we had to meet in these circumstances.
quests_json.Quest.wood_1.step4: Me too, but I'm still very happy to see you!
quests_json.Quest.wood_3.step1: What should we do about this haystack?
quests_json.Quest.wood_3.step2: Nothing yet. Weâ€™ll need far more hay if you want to bring back the islandâ€™s glory.
quests_json.Quest.wood_3.step3: Iâ€™m not sure how greatness relates to hay but youâ€™re much more well-versed in whatâ€™s happening here so I trust your judgment.
quests_json.Quest.wood_4.step1: How farming is going to help us find my grandpa?
quests_json.Quest.wood_4.step2: Patience, Lisa. Archibald is my best friend and I want to find him as much as you do. But we should also take care of the island. Otherwise, he will have nothing to come back to.
quests_json.Quest.wood_5.step1: How farming is going to help us find my grandpa?
quests_json.Quest.wood_5.step2: Patience, Lisa. Archibald is my best friend and I want to find him as much as you do. But we should also take care of the island. Otherwise, he will have nothing to come back to.
quests_json.Quest.wood_6.step1: I still don't get it. I remember coming here when I was a little girl. It was absolutely packed with animals and plants. What happened?
quests_json.Quest.wood_6.step2: Thatâ€™s why youâ€™re here. To help us solve this mystery. Your grandpa already tried to but disappeared. Youâ€™re our only hope to find him and save the island!
quests_json.Quest.wood_6.step3: Okay, let's bring back life here!
quests_json.Quest.wood_7.step1: What was the last thing you remember my grandpa do?
quests_json.Quest.wood_7.step2: He was obsessed with those amulets you brought from the Exchange. He told me that they were the key to solving everything.
quests_json.Quest.wood_7.step3: Okay, now we know what we should look for. And as you said, letâ€™s not forget about keeping the island habitable.
quests_json.Quest.king_1.step1: Look! Itâ€™s an axe. Should we use it to chop our way through the thicket?
quests_json.Quest.king_1.step2: Can you really handle it? I know I canâ€™t. But I'm acquainted with someone who knows how to handle it!
quests_json.Quest.king_2.step1: What if we don't find this mysterious axe person? Time is running out and the island needs us.
quests_json.Quest.king_2.step2: Relax. He is somewhere here since he has nowhere else to go. We just have to look better.
quests_json.Quest.dragonisland_1.step1: There is a place where we can try our luck and look for Archibald...
quests_json.Quest.dragonisland_1.step2: Great! Can you take me there?
quests_json.Quest.dragonisland_1.step3: It's too dangerous for us alone. But maybe Axel will go with us?
quests_json.Quest.dragonisland_1.step4: Alright, I'll talk to him. But I can't promise anything since this man is so stubborn.
quests_json.Quest.bear_1.step1: Excuse me, did you get lost? Iâ€™m sorry, but you donâ€™t look like someone who belongs on this island.
quests_json.Quest.bear_1.step2: For your information, my grandfather, Archibald Whitlock, was the one who discovered this place. If you donâ€™t mind, I have lots of things to do here.
quests_json.Quest.bear_1.step3: Apologies. Do forgive my rudeness. I donâ€™t get to talk to pretty city girls that often. Axel Hoffmann is at your service!
quests_json.Quest.bear_1.step4: Thank you. Can you trace the owner of this board?
quests_json.Quest.bear_2.step1: So, where does this Lisa come from? And what is she up to?
quests_json.Quest.bear_2.step2: She is here to stay and help me find Archibald while taking care of the island. I hope the two of youâ€™ll hit it off.
quests_json.Quest.bear_2.step3: Alright, Iâ€™ll be on my best behaviour.
quests_json.Quest.bear_3.step1: Isnâ€™t it ironic? Iâ€™m looking for my grandpa and youâ€™re looking for your granddaughterâ€¦
quests_json.Quest.bear_3.step2: Oh, well, Iâ€™m not surprised since Marina was spending a lot of time with Archibald. She was probably the last one to see him.
quests_json.Quest.bear_3.step3: Thatâ€™s great! I already cannot wait to meet her.
quests_json.Quest.bear_4.step1: It feels bad to say it, but you probably know grandpa better than me. Do you have the slightest idea where he might be?
quests_json.Quest.bear_4.step2: Lizzy, darling, if Iâ€™d knew I wouldnâ€™t involve you in this. The only way we can find him is as a team.
quests_json.Quest.bear_4.step3: And our team isnâ€™t full without Marina so letâ€™s conclude our search!
quests_json.Quest.bear_5.step1: Maybe you know whatâ€™s happening on the island?
quests_json.Quest.bear_5.step2: I would love to say that I do but I havenâ€™t lived here long enough to get acquainted with all the intricacies.
quests_json.Quest.bear_5.step3: Did you live here long enough to get acquainted with my grandpa?
quests_json.Quest.bear_5.step4: I did. Actually, this axe was a gift from Mr. Whitlock. I hope it will help us get to Marina as soon as possible.
quests_json.Quest.candies_4.step1: I thought that I remembered the island being full of fruit! This means that weâ€™re on the right track.
quests_json.Quest.candies_4.step2: Well done, Lizzy! Letâ€™s collect them and take to the Exchange.
quests_json.Quest.wood_9.step1: Do you think it's a big enough farm to start with?
quests_json.Quest.wood_9.step2: Are you kidding? It's perfect. It will definitely help us to put things back on track.
quests_json.Quest.wood_9.step3: Great! Then, let's do our best to restore it.
quests_json.Quest.stone_1.step1: The island is already looking much better, donâ€™t you think?
quests_json.Quest.stone_1.step2: Indeed it does but there is still enough space for farming. Letâ€™s take advantage of it.
quests_json.Quest.stone_2.step1: How everything is going with your poultry project?
quests_json.Quest.stone_2.step2: Itâ€™s fine, thank you. Lizzy is very helpful when it comes to finding resources.
quests_json.Quest.stone_2.step3: She is a special one. Keep an eye on her so she doesnâ€™t get into trouble.
quests_json.Quest.stone_3.step1: Our poultry is growing. Should we start building a shed for it?
quests_json.Quest.stone_3.step2: Not yet. Letâ€™s wait and see how big it can get.
quests_json.Quest.stone_4.step1: How come you know so much about farming? You look more like aâ€¦
quests_json.Quest.stone_4.step2: Forester? I owe everything I know to my grandpa too so we have more in common than you might think.
quests_json.Quest.stone_4.step3: Maybe you can teach me a thing or two so I donâ€™t come bothering you every time I need help.
quests_json.Quest.stone_4.step4: Not at all. Itâ€™s an honor helping you with the island and the search.
quests_json.Quest.stone_5.step1: How come you know so much about farming? You look more like aâ€¦
quests_json.Quest.stone_5.step2: Forester? I owe everything I know to my grandpa too so we have more in common than you might think.
quests_json.Quest.stone_5.step3: Maybe you can teach me a thing or two so I donâ€™t come bothering you every time I need help.
quests_json.Quest.stone_5.step4: Not at all. Itâ€™s an honor helping you with the island and the search.
quests_json.Quest.stone_6.step1: Itâ€™s time for you to learn how to use an ax. Letâ€™s build something!
quests_json.Quest.stone_6.step2: Finally! I was waiting for you to say that because I hate the feeling of not being busy.
quests_json.Quest.stone_7.step1: Did you know that the chickens were the first thing your grandpa found on the island?
quests_json.Quest.stone_7.step2: Really? Looks like weâ€™re getting back to the roots.
quests_json.Quest.stone_7.step3: Weâ€™ll build the nicest farm those chickens have ever seen!
quests_json.Quest.stone_8.step1: Do you need my help, guys? It feels strange to watch you do all the work.
quests_json.Quest.stone_8.step2: Donâ€™t worry, uncle Roger. Youâ€™ll get many more chances to contribute since we have a lot of work ahead of us.
quests_json.Quest.stone_10.step2: Of course, it was abandoned for a very long time. Grab the tools, letâ€™s restore it!
quests_json.Quest.wagon_1.step1: Is your offer to help us still standing, uncle Roger? We need to build a barn to store things in.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_1.step2: I would love to but my lower back is killing me. Letâ€™s see if Marina is available.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_2.step1: Marina, Darling, do you mind helping Lisa and Axel with their new project?
quests_json.Quest.wagon_2.step2: It will be my pleasure. The island was very kind to me all these years and itâ€™s time to pay it back.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_3.step1: You know, I was about your age when my grandpa took me here for the first time.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_3.step2: I didnâ€™t know that. Did you like it?
quests_json.Quest.wagon_3.step3: It was the best. I refused to go home but he told me that I can come back any time I want.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_3.step4: Donâ€™t worry, Lisa. Weâ€™ll make the island even better than it was before and find your grandpa!
quests_json.Quest.wagon_4.step1: Look at you, girls. Youâ€™ve done a pretty amazing job!
quests_json.Quest.wagon_4.step2: Well, Iâ€™ve had a pretty good tutor.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_4.step3: It looks like I have nothing left to teach you so Iâ€™m just going to help you.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_5.step1: Why do you need a barn anyway?
quests_json.Quest.wagon_5.step2: Some people like to keep things in order, you know.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_5.step3: Even if you have nothing to store in there I can always occupy it with my surfboards.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_6.step1: Is there a way to make it even bigger? Much bigger.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_6.step2: Sure. We just need to find more resources. Much more.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_6.step3: Leave it to me and Marina!
quests_json.Quest.wagon_7.step1: Itâ€™s almost the same as it was before, am I right, Marina?
quests_json.Quest.wagon_7.step2: Yep. Letâ€™s make Axel responsible for bringing wood in while we remodel the building?
quests_json.Quest.wagon_8.step1: Wow, I had no idea that you wanted it to be so grand.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_8.step2: Weâ€™re not done yet. We need more wood to finish the construction.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_8.step3: More than Iâ€™ve already brought in?
quests_json.Quest.wagon_8.step4: What can I say, we have a lot of things that need storage.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_10.step2: Yeah, I think so. This looks about right.
quests_json.Quest.wagon_10.step3: Duly noted. Iâ€™ll keep it in mind when we start working on another structure.
quests_json.Quest.elf_1.step1: Do you know whose this is? Weâ€™re desperate for someone with gardening skills.
quests_json.Quest.elf_1.step2: Ah, yes. How did I forget about Gloria. Iâ€™m the last person on this island she is going to help.
quests_json.Quest.elf_1.step3: I donâ€™t know what happened between the two of you but letâ€™s try and talk to her.
quests_json.Quest.elf_2.step1: Be honest, uncle Rodger, what did you do?
quests_json.Quest.elf_2.step2: Why do you presume that it was something I did? Thereâ€™re always two people in a relationship.
quests_json.Quest.elf_2.step3: Grandpa always told me that youâ€™re impossible to date. "Too free-spirited", he would say.
quests_json.Quest.elf_2.step4: The first part hurts. But the second one is true. Hopefully, sheâ€™ll find it in her heart to forgive me.
quests_json.Quest.elf_3.step2: You can say that. He used to consult her a lot about gardening the last past month before he disappeared.
quests_json.Quest.elf_3.step3: If we find out what he was asking her about it could be our first clue to finding him.

quests_json.Quest.rpdoll_3.step1: Wow! Just look at it. This castle is so big. Itâ€™s so easy to get lostâ€¦ and the fog doesnâ€™t help!
quests_json.Quest.rpdoll_3.step2: This is exactly what happened to princess Eleonora! And this brave prince embarked on a journey to find her.
quests_json.Quest.rpdoll_3.step3: We canâ€™t just stand and watch him do it alone. Letâ€™s help!
quests_json.Quest.rpperfume_3.step1: Where does this pleasant aroma come from?
quests_json.Quest.rpperfume_3.step2: I think those are the fragrances from the princessâ€™ collection.
quests_json.Quest.rpperfume_3.step3: If she can smell them too it will help her find the way back to her chambers.
quests_json.Quest.rpperfume_3.step4: Great idea, letâ€™s find the rest and try it!
quests_json.Quest.rpcandle_3.step1: I think if we get more of these candelabras we will have enough light to see the princess even in the darkest corners of the castle.
quests_json.Quest.rpcandle_3.step2: This is the best idea weâ€™ve had so far!
quests_json.Quest.rpjewelry_3.step1: One thing the princess canâ€™t live without is her jewelry.
quests_json.Quest.rpjewelry_3.step2: No wonderâ€¦ It's so pretty and shiny.
quests_json.Quest.rpjewelry_3.step3: Shinyâ€¦ Of course! We can use it to signal the princess our location.
quests_json.Quest.rpcomb_3.step1: Apparently, princessâ€™ hair possesses magic powers.
quests_json.Quest.rpcomb_3.step2: Why doesn't she use it to find her way back?
quests_json.Quest.rpcomb_3.step3: Sheâ€™s missing the hair brush required to activate them. If only we could find a way to bring it to herâ€¦
quests_json.Quest.rpanimals_3.step1: You know what? I was thinking that if we canâ€™t get the job done it might not be such a bad idea to delegate it to our four-legged friends.
quests_json.Quest.rpanimals_3.step2: I am so desperate to find the princess so I am willing to try anything!
quests_json.Quest.rpdress_3.step1: Don't you have a feeling that this castle is one giant wardrobe? How many dresses are enough...
quests_json.Quest.rpdress_3.step2: This does not surprise me since we are in the princess' chambers. I bet your house is full of your things too.
quests_json.Quest.rpdress_3.step3: Yes. The only difference is that I don't have a handsome prince who is always ready to come to the rescue.
quests_json.Quest.rpdress_3.step4: Speaking about the prince, letâ€™s find the rest of the garments and bring them to him.
quests_json.Quest.rpchameleon_3.step1: What a cute little creature. Did you ever dream about having a pet?
quests_json.Quest.rpchameleon_3.step2: Even if I did, it would not be a chameleon.
quests_json.Quest.rpchameleon_3.step4: It becomes impossible to find one when it mimics the surroundings. So once we have it, we should bring it to the prince before it disappears.
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_1.step1: The princess must be somewhere nearby. This pan has her initials on it.
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_1.step2: Itâ€™s a good sign. Letâ€™s keep looking!
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_2.step1: What a wonderful cupcake! You can tell that the princess made it.
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_2.step2: I guess cooking is just one of her many talents. Letâ€™s see what else we can find!
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_3.step1: Do you think the princess left the lanterns behind so she can find her way back home?
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_3.step2: Or so that we can trace her! Letâ€™s follow the lanterns. I am sure they will shed light on other clues.
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_4.step1: Just look at this flower! Why is it glowing?
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_4.step2: I think the princess is the right person to ask this question. Letâ€™s find her to get all the answers!
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_5.step1: Did you know that the princess loves to paint?
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_5.step2: I am not surprised. We saw her talents displayed before.
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_5.step3: I am starting to think that she painted this castleâ€¦
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_5.step4: I bet she regrets not drafting its map.
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_6.step1: Did you ever wonder what a princessâ€™ dress might look like?
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_6.step2: I am more curious if she made it herself.
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_6.step3: I think we saw enough evidence of her various skills. Sewing a dress, how hard can it be?
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_6.step4: Letâ€™s make more and find out!
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_7.step1: We know that Eleonora is somewhere in the castle and that we can only find her if we all work together.
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_7.step2: That is indeed the case. If we manage to remove the fog and find all the clues, make no mistake, the princess will be saved.
quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_7.step3: Alright then. Let's proceed with collecting the ingredients and see where we can find the first clue!

undersea_json.Tutorial.undersea2.step1: A pair of flippers! Luckily we already know how to use them. Letâ€™s merge.
undersea_json.Tutorial.undersea2.step2: Swimming is tiring, and I need food! Let's see if we can grow something underwater!
undersea_json.Tutorial.undersea2.step3: It worked! But I am starved just by looking at these apples! Let's try to harvest.
undersea_json.Tutorial.undersea2.step4: It's a miracle! Let's see if it tastes like one.
undersea_json.Tutorial.undersea2.step5: Now I feel like exploring! Let's continue our journey.
undersea_json.TravelBookForce.undersea2: Put your mask back on and continue your underwater adventure!

unitStories_json.UnitStory.wood_7.step1: Are you starting to fall in love with the island already?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wood_7.step2: Please, uncle Roger. I'll stay here only until we find grandpa. My city life is waiting for me.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wood_9.step1: Just look at it, Lizzy! Isnâ€™t it a testament to our perseverance and resilience?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wood_9.step2: It looks to me just like a bunch of planks put together.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wood_9.step3: Itâ€™s much more than that. Give it time, and youâ€™ll learn to appreciate it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.stone_8.step1: Look at you, uncle Roger! Your contribution is invaluable.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.stone_8.step2: Not at all, Lizzy. You're second to none. City girl yesterday, tropical goddess today!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.stone_10.step1: Does this look better to you than our cattle barn?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.stone_10.step2: I think this whole farm life on an island is starting to grow on me.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.stone_10.step3: I knew it would! I think youâ€™re ready for your next project.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wagon_8.step1: This thing is massive. But let me guess, still not big enough?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wagon_8.step2: You are a quick learner. Don't worry, though. We're at the finish line.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wagon_10.step1: Isnâ€™t it amazing? Thanks for helping me out!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wagon_10.step2: No problem. You didnâ€™t know how to hold an axe the first time I saw you and now youâ€™re building barns.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wagon_10.step3: Iâ€™m not sure why yet, but this place inspires me!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.king_2.step1: If this axe wasn't so heavy I would've picked it up myself because I'm losing my patience here...
unitStories_json.UnitStory.king_2.step2: And for no good reason. We just need to find a couple more of these axes for their owner to reveal himself.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.king_3.step1: Axel, there you are. Weâ€™ve been looking everywhere for you.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.king_3.step2: Good to see you, Mr Hart. Who are we?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.king_3.step3: Me and Lizzy. Wait until you see her. Youâ€™re gonna love it!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_5.step1: Canâ€™t we just call her and ask to come back home?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_5.step2: way ahead of you, Lizzy. I already tried to reach Marina but sheâ€™s got no reception.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_5.step3: Then, I guess, finding her ourselves is the only option. Especially, since weâ€™re almost there!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_6.step1: Grandpa, arenâ€™t you too old to walk that much? You couldâ€™ve just called.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_6.step2: What is it with you girls and your phones? Check your signal the next time you go that far.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_6.step3: Oops, sorry about that. Is there something I can help you with?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_6.step4: Yes. We are looking for Archibald. What was the last place you saw him?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.elf_5.step1: This is it. Gloria must be somewhere near. She never leaves her watering can alone for too long.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.elf_5.step4: The fact that things didnâ€™t work out for you two despite you knowing her so well. Iâ€™m pretty sure that all is forgiven!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.elf_6.step1: Hey, Gloria, happy to see me?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.elf_6.step2: Roger Hart. To what do I owe the pleasure?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.elf_6.step3: We have a little team here with a mission to find Archibald and save the island.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.elf_6.step4: Well, for such a noble cause Iâ€™m willing to leave the past behind and move forward!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.magicplant_8.step1: We did it, Lizzy! Are you ready to try this thing out?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.magicplant_8.step2: To be honest, Iâ€™m a little scared but I donâ€™t remember the last time I was so excited.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.magicplant_8.step3: Donâ€™t worry, everything is going to be fine. After all, the spirits of the island are always looking after us.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fruitshop_0.step1: Did you know that there was a fruit kiosk on the island?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fruitshop_0.step2: I'm starting to think that I know nothing about the place where I've spent my whole life...
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fruitshop_0.step3: Don't be so dramatic. Let's find out what it has to offer!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.resourceshop_0.step1: Look, Lisa, I've found a store too.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.resourceshop_0.step3: I have no idea but probably something useful for restoring the island!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.discountshop_0.step1: I've noticed how much do you like shopping. I know just a place for you!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.discountshop_0.step2: It better be something really special since I already know where to get my fruit and resources.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.discountshop_0.step3: Don't worry. I wouldn't waste your time on something that basic. The gems you can find here will make the island shine!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warlock_6.step1: Look at the size of that thing! We can use it to transport goods to other islands.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warlock_6.step2: I donâ€™t think so. It looks like a small passenger boat to me.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warlock_6.step3: Letâ€™s find its owner and ask what is it used for.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warlock_7.step1: Excuse me, does this boat belong to you?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warlock_7.step3: Did you by any chance take my grandpa anywhere?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warlock_7.step4: Why donâ€™t we sit down and talk about the ways we can help each other.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bamboo_8.step1: I must admit, these sheep do look adorable.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bamboo_8.step2: I'm so glad we're on the same page, uncle Roger. Because we're not finished yet and your help will be much appretiated.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bamboo_10.step1: I know that this whole thing was my idea but even in my wildest dreams I couldnâ€™t imagine that it will turn out to be so great!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bamboo_10.step2: Thatâ€™s what we do, uncle Roger. Now I can enjoy our life here even more by watching the sheep grow.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bamboo_10.step3: Donâ€™t take too long though. I have another crazy idea cooking up!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sapphire_9.step1: I wonder how far they can fly? What if they donâ€™t like it here and decide to leave.

unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlfranky_0.step1: Welcome to Halloween Island! I know it might look spooky but celebrating Halloween here has been a tradition for years now.

unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_8.step1: Now that we understand it all, the surroundings don't seem that frightening.

unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_10.step1: Were you scared when you came here the first time?

unitStories_json.UnitStory.hlbattlepass_11.step1: I just wanted to warn you all, that, even though weâ€™re doing great and are on track, we still have to be careful.

unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_5.step2: Everything is great. Weâ€™re making history here. All thanks to you!

unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_15.step1: What are you suggesting, uncle Roger?

unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_22.step1: Sorry to interrupt, grandpa. But there is news. News you would all like to hear.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_22.step2: Itâ€™s better to be good, Marina. I was quite enjoying myself on the construction site. Look at that beauty!

unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_23.step1: How do you like the news, guys?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_23.step2: Itâ€™s great! Did he come up with a solution?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_23.step3: This is something we have to hear from him.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_23.step4: Let's welcome him back with our best work, then!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_24.step1: Santa Cruz! Itâ€™s so good to see you. Even if this building turns to dust tomorrow.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_24.step2: I am happy to see you too. And donâ€™t you worry about the building. It took longer than I expected, but the formula is ready. We just need to apply it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_25.step1: What a fantastic job, guys. All of you! I know that I said it a million times already, but youâ€™re the best team anyone can wish for.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_25.step2: Thank you, uncle Roger! It feels good to be a part of it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_25.step3: And to work alongside a genius! How were you able to turn things around, Santa Cruz?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_25.step4: I donâ€™t want to bore you with the details. Letâ€™s just say that I had no option to fail since you were doing the best you can!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcookie_0.step1: Where am I and what I am doing here? And why is this cookie staring at me?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcookie_0.step2: You donâ€™t remember anything? Oh myâ€¦
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcookie_0.step3: I remember everything except the part where we come to a cold island covered with snow.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcookie_0.step4: Donâ€™t worry. Everything will become clear very soon. Letâ€™s start with something simple!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcookie_1.step1: I am serious, does this cookie have a problem with me?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcookie_1.step2: The cookies are essential for a merry Christmas celebration.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcookie_1.step4: I see that we have a lot to work with. Letâ€™s take it one step at a time!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbattlepass_0.step1: And what about this tree? Is it special or something?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbattlepass_0.step2: Not yet but it will be once we decorate it!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbattlepass_0.step3: Why would you want to decorate a tree?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbattlepass_0.step4: This is one of the most important Christmas traditions. You will love it!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmtoy_0.step1: So, what is Christmas and why do we have to celebrate it?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmtoy_0.step2: It is the jolliest time of the year with lots of different traditions.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmtoy_0.step3: Can you name one? Otherwise, it feels like you are just making it up as we go.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmtoy_1.step1: So, we just collect these ornaments and put them on the shelf?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmtoy_1.step2: We use them to decorate the tree.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmtoy_1.step4: Yes, there is always a tree when it comes to Christmas.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmtoy_2.step1: How do you like Christmas so far?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmtoy_2.step2: I still donâ€™t get it. We walk in the cold looking for toys. Dubious pleasure.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmtoy_2.step3: Maybe you will change your mind when we find all the ornaments.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmtoy_3.step2: Of course we do. You did too.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmtoy_3.step4: Oh yeah, big time! Last Christmas you were even nominated for the Best decorated tree award.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmtoy_4.step1: Well, It seems like we collected all the ornaments. Pretty scarce assortment for the so-called Christmas island.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmtoy_4.step2: Did you at least have fun looking for them?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmtoy_4.step4: Thatâ€™s the point! Regarding the assortment, there are plenty of other things here for your recollection.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsocks_0.step1: Finally something useful! My feet are getting cold from all the ornament searching.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsocks_0.step2: Everything we find on this island is related to Christmas. One way or another.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsocks_0.step3: So, if I wear these slippers, will I become a part of it too?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsocks_0.step4: Yes. But I am sure you will like it!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsocks_1.step1: The previous ones I wore were pretty comfy. I wonder what these feel like?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsocks_1.step2: You know what they sayâ€¦ There is only one way to find out!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsocks_2.step1: So, how do you like it?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsocks_2.step2: I know it might sound crazy but it seems like every step I make wearing those is barely making any sound.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsocks_2.step3: Considering what they are made for, this makes perfect sense.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsocks_3.step1: Let me guess, these boots are also a part of the tree decoration ritual?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsocks_3.step2: You can hang them on the tree if you want. But they are much more suited for roof walking.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsocks_3.step4: It didnâ€™t stop you from spending last Christmas Eve by the chimney.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsocks_4.step1: Why do you need special boots to walk on the roof?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsocks_4.step2: This is the easiest way to deliver gifts and remain unnoticed.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsocks_4.step3: There are gifts involved in the Christmas celebration?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsocks_4.step4: Of course. This is probably its most essential part.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcandy_0.step1: Candy? Are you sure that Christmas is not just another word for Halloween?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcandy_0.step2: You remember Halloween but donâ€™t remember Christmas? Very strangeâ€¦
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcandy_0.step3: Of course! How could I forget my legendary trick?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcandy_0.step4: Letâ€™s hope that you at least wonâ€™t forget this Christmas.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcandy_1.step1: So, whatâ€™s the difference between Christmas and Halloween?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcandy_1.step2: Sweets are essential for Halloween whereas itâ€™s just one of the many Christmas attributes.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcandy_1.step3: I love sweets so Halloween sounds better so far.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcandy_2.step1: Do you just give lollipops as presents for Christmas?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcandy_2.step2: You can do that but we usually do more than that.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcandy_2.step4: Like a box of lollipops on top of something actually valuable.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcandy_3.step1: I guess Christmas is starting to sound exciting. Ornaments, roof climbing boots, giftsâ€¦ Tell me more about the gifts!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcandy_3.step2: How about you help us find the rest of the candy canes and we will show you where the gifts are coming from?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcandy_4.step1: Arenâ€™t you going to tell me a story about what I was doing with my candies last Christmas?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcandy_4.step2: Something tells me that you know perfectly well what transpired.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcandy_4.step3: I devoured all of my sweets and then did the same to yours?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcandy_5.step1: So, all the candies are collected. Is it a good time to learn more about the gifts and where they come from?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcandy_5.step2: Absolutely! There is no better time to learn about gifts than amidst the Christmas celebration.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_0.step1: Is this your Christmas gift for me?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_0.step2: No, I have something else in mind. This is just the means of transportation.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_0.step3: I see. In that case, letâ€™s find the second ski.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_1.step1: Now that we have a whole set, letâ€™s ski!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_1.step2: Is this also a Christmas tradition?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_1.step3: Not really, itâ€™s just easier to ski than to walk when everything is covered in snow.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_2.step1: Do you think we can all fit into this snow saucer?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_2.step2: Of course not! But we can always find some more.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_3.step1: To be honest, I always wanted to ride one of these.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_3.step2: Really? Wait until you see what else weâ€™ve got in store for you!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_4.step1: You werenâ€™t lying! The sled looks even better than a tube.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_4.step2: And you know what is the best part?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_4.step4: It can fit both of us!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_5.step1: You probably donâ€™t remember but last Christmas we had a proper snow race.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_5.step2: Sounds like a lot of fun! Who won?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_5.step3: We actually ended up in the snow, playing with snowballs and making a snowman.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_5.step4: Youâ€™re right. I donâ€™t remember, but I would love to relive it!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_6.step1: And here are the promised Ð¡hristmas presents! The sleigh is used to deliver them.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_6.step2: Alright, this makes sense. But where do they come from?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsled_6.step3: This is a great question. To answer it, we need to embark on a little adventure!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_0.step1: Did you bring me all the way here to show this log?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_0.step2: No, this is just the beginning. You need to be patient if you want to know the truth about Christmas.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_1.step1: Be honest, you just want a winter cottage for yourself and use me to build it?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_1.step2: If I wanted a cottage I would wish for it for Christmas.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_1.step4: Of course, this is how you get your Christmas gifts.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_2.step1: So, basically, Christmas is all about wishing for what you want and getting it?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_2.step2: You can say that. But only if youâ€™ve been good during the year.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_2.step3: How do I know if I was?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_2.step4: You were great so you deserve anything you wished for.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_3.step1: How can I know what I wished for last Christmas?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_3.step2: Itâ€™s probably written on a letter you addressed to Santa and sent here. Letâ€™s try to find it!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_4.step1: Do you think it might be here?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_4.step2: Even if itâ€™s not, we will keep looking.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_5.step1: What if we donâ€™t find the letter? My Christmas will be ruined.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_5.step2: Donâ€™t worry, we will do our best to locate it. Letâ€™s scour this place.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_6.step1: By the way, what is this place?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_6.step2: This is where all the magic happens.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_6.step3: I donâ€™t see any wands inside. Only hammers, nails, and other tools.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_6.step4: This is precisely what is needed to keep a gift workshop going. This, and jolly spirit.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_7.step1: If my letter wasnâ€™t here, where else can it be?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_7.step2: I might know another place but it will require some effort to find it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_7.step3: Weâ€™ve come so far already. There is nothing that can stop us now.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmcastle_7.step4: Thatâ€™s what I call Christmas spirit!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_0.step1: You know that I have a cookie phobia now. Why would you do this to me?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_0.step2: Do you want to find your letter or not?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_0.step4: In that case, we need to find a Christmas castle first.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_1.step1: Why is this Christmas castle so important?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_1.step2: Sometimes the letters do not reach the workshop and stay here.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_1.step3: What is the reason for that?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_1.step4: Not all wishes require nails and glue to be fulfilled.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_2.step1: Is it possible that my letter wasnâ€™t delivered?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_2.step2: That is the best part about Christmas. Everyone gets a chance to be heard.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_3.step1: Is this the castle weâ€™ve been looking for?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_3.step2: Do not sell Christmas short. You will know thatâ€™s a castle when you see it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_4.step1: Should we split to look for the letter?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_4.step2: We better stay together. Although Christmas is merry, snow might be dangerous sometimes.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_5.step1: This place looks cozy. I can imagine myself living here.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_5.step2: Maybe this is what you wished for last Christmas.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_5.step3: I doubt it but I cannot be sure of anything anymore.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_6.step1: And what did you wish for last Christmas?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_6.step2: I just wanted lots of sweets.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_6.step3: I hope I didnâ€™t wish the same. Otherwise, we will have too much, even for all of us.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_7.step1: I found a note! But itâ€™s not your letter, though.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_7.step3: It says that all the special last Christmas letters are being stored in the ice castle.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_8.step1: Itâ€™s sad that we didnâ€™t find the letter.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_8.step2: At least we finally know where it is.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbread_8.step3: True. And we got a chance to admire the Christmas castle which is a miracle in itself.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_0.step1: Do you know what I want to find more than my letter? Gloves!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_0.step2: This piece of ice might look cold but itâ€™s actuallyâ€¦ Oh no, it is cold! Letâ€™s each write letters to Santa asking for the warmest gloves.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_1.step1: Is there a magical way to make the Ice castle appear?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_1.step2: I think itâ€™s not the best idea to wish for something new before we find out what you wished for before.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_2.step1: Arenâ€™t you a little bit scared to find out what your wish was? I know I would be.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_2.step2: I know that much. If I wished for it I mustâ€™ve really wanted it so there is nothing to be worried about.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_3.step1: At least itâ€™s starting to look like a building. If we're lucky enough, we might even see the construction finished before next Christmas.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_3.step2: Donâ€™t be so dramatic! With a team like ours, we will be done in no time.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_4.step1: To be honest, I have no idea how somebody can live here. It looks freezing!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_4.step2: I donâ€™t think itâ€™s made for a living. Itâ€™s a vault for special wishes.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_4.step3: Every vault should have a watchman.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_4.step4: I guess the coldness is its main guardian!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_5.step1: I have a feeling that weâ€™re very close to finding the letter.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_5.step2: I am glad to hear that because I am freezing. I am not sure I can keep going for too longâ€¦
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_6.step1: We finally found it! This letter has your initials on it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_6.step2: And it does look like my handwritingâ€¦
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_6.step3: The moment of truth! Letâ€™s read it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_7.step1: So, what does the letter say?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_7.step2: â€œThis Christmas with my friends was amazing. So amazing, in fact, that I would gladly erase all memories of it to relive it next year.â€
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_7.step3: Everything checks out. Except for one little thingâ€¦
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_8.step1: So, you wished to forget about last Christmas but ended up forgetting about Christmas in general.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_8.step2: Maybe it was the only way your wish couldâ€™ve been fulfilled.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_8.step3: Anyway, Iâ€™ve got what I wanted. Wonderful Christmas with my friends full of joy and excitement.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_9.step1: We made it, guys. I present to you the Ice castle!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_9.step2: Do you want to know something cool? We didnâ€™t see it last Christmas. So, technically, this Christmas is even better.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_9.step3: But, please, donâ€™t wish to forget all about it. We promise to show you a good time next year even if you have expectations.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmigloo_9.step4: Donâ€™t worry, I wonâ€™t. This journey has taught me that the best thing about Christmas is the memories you share, not the wishes you get granted.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsanta_3.step1: Weâ€™re in luck! Not every day do you get to meet Santa Claus himself.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsanta_3.step2: And why is it an honor to meet him?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsanta_3.step3: He is responsible for spreading all the jolliness and merriness around Christmas. And for making dreams come true.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsnowman_5.step1: Now say hi to Mr. Snowman. He helps Santa to stay healthy.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsnowman_5.step2: And how is he doing that?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmsnowman_5.step3: By making sure that he snacks with a carrot, not a candy cane.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmdeer_6.step1: And here is a Christmas deer!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmdeer_6.step2: He is the one fighting with Santa for a carrot?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmdeer_6.step3: He is the one flying Santaâ€™s harness so his hands are free to eat the carrot.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmyeti_7.step1: We found the yeti! He makes sure that the Christmas island is clean and snowy enough throughout the year.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmyeti_7.step2: Where is he taking that tree?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmelf_10.step1: And here are Christmas elves. They prepare and pack all the gifts.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmelf_10.step2: Do you think they have some spare boxes?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmelf_10.step3: Absolutely not. These are the most precise and neat creatures on the North Pole.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmhunter_11.step1: And who is she? I admire and envy her coat.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmhunter_11.step2: Youâ€™re looking at the local postman. She was probably the one to deliver your letter.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmfactory_0.step1: Look, this is a toy factory!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmfactory_0.step2: It's great and all, but what can we do with it?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmfactory_0.step3: We do not have to do anything! It makes a lot of toys, which we can take for ourselves!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmfactory_0.step4: Sounds great, but what if I want more?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmfactory_0.step5: I think it can be possible to come to an agreement with the factory and buy more toys if needed.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmrudolf_0.step1: A sleigh and a harness. What can this possibly mean?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmrudolf_0.step2: One thing and one thing only â€“ it's time to load it with toys.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmrudolf_0.step3: Will we get something in exchange?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmrudolf_0.step4: Of course! The more toys we put in, the more stuff we get back.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmrudolf_1.step1: We found another harness. Is it the same as the one we already have?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmrudolf_1.step2: I can't say I'm an expert but something tells me that two reindeers are better than just one.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmrudolf_1.step3: Makes perfect sense! I hope they will bring us even more stuff since we're having so much fun this Christmas!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmgiftgenerator_0.step1: Wow! What kind of machine is that?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmgiftgenerator_0.step2: It's a Toy Improver! Throw the simplest toy in it and it will upgrade it!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmgiftgenerator_0.step3: Great! So now we will have the coolest toys ever! But what should we do with them?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmgiftgenerator_0.step4: Don't worry about it, Christmas Island will tell you what you can do with all your cool toys!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmpenguin_0.step1: Is this snowball also related to Christmas?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmpenguin_0.step2: To be honest, I've never seen it before so we will have to find out together.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmpenguin_1.step1: What a cute creature! How are you, poor thing?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmpenguin_1.step2: I didn't know you can speak penguin.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmpenguin_1.step3: What can I say, Christmas is the most special time of the year!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmpenguin_2.step1: So, what did the penguin tell you?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmpenguin_2.step2: He said that he can help us open new territories if we help him find his Christmas scarf.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmpenguin_2.step3: On top of that, he will make us a sculpture of himself.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmpenguin_2.step4: I didn't know that you can sculpt with flippers. This makes this exchange an even greater bargain!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmpenguin_3.step1: The penguin is happy and we have our own Christmas landmark now!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmpenguin_3.step2: I hope that with a decoration like this you will never forget about Christmas again!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbridge_4.step1: I am speechless! This is the merriest bridge the Christmas Island has ever seen!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbridge_4.step2: We are glad to hear that.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmbridge_4.step3: Hopefully, our good deeds will be noticed by Santa and he will reward us for the job well done.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmlamberjack_0.step1: Who is this lovely man in a wonderful sweater?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmlamberjack_0.step2: He is a Christmas Exchange owner. Once we have the ingredients, he is the right person to come to.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.xmlamberjack_0.step3: Great! I wish I could exchange something for his outfit but special items will do too!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_6.step1: We finally found our princess. Hooray!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_6.step2: I would love to share your excitement but I donâ€™t think itâ€™s the princess. It might be her younger sister or her younger self.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_6.step3: Her younger self? How is that possible?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_6.step4: Do not forget that this castle is full of magic. Whoever this is, I am sure she can lead us to Eleonora!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_7.step1: We did it! The princess is safe. And we make a great team!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_7.step2: We always do. It just took you a trip to a magic castle to realize that.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_7.step3: No, I always knew that. I just love to use every opportunity to remind everyone of it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_7.step4: I hope youâ€™ll get another chance to do that on our next adventure!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpdoll_2.step2: I donâ€™t think so. Still looks like a doll.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpdoll_2.step3: A nicely made one. I hope it can help us get to the princess herself.
